value:
There are times when a king faces
difficult decisions. But they must
always look to their country's future.

Seeing Alfonse here, now... There is
much he can learn from the Day of
Devotion. I look forward to his growth.

Because of you, the people can enjoy
the Day of Devotion. You have my
gratitude, $Nu.

Alfonse is still an inexperienced
ruler. But he will likely grow into
a better king than I was one day.

A king should not be all-powerful,
placed above others. He should
give of himself for his people.

I am Gustav, King of Askr. I bear an
invitation to the Day of Devotion
from $Nf.

The love here reflects the
history of this country.

Strength may wane with
time, but experience is
just the opposite.

My strength is not enough...
How disappointing.

The people are what grant
me my strength. I will give
them a king in return.

I am the king of Askr, Gustav. I had
not imagined I would be able to visit
Askr again. Certainly not like this...

A king, too, must understand the
true value of love.$k$pLove for country, for its people...
and love for family.$k$pWithout love, a king cannot keep
a great country united.$k$pAlfonse and Sharena have much
they can gain from this festival.$k$pI hope you will continue to support
Alfonse as well. This country needs
your love, $Nu.
むぅん！
Be gone!
ぐああっ！
Not good...
Out of my sight!
Know the strength of Askr!
For our people!
To open the way!
Alfonse... Forgive me...
Yes.
Allow me to express my gratitude to you. You've protected my children ably so far.
Is that some sort of greeting in the Order of Heroes?
My scar? Chalk that one up to a Hero from another world...
Alfonse is a wise young man. I imagine he will make a good king one day.
Sharena is kind, but I pray that kindness won't bring her harm.
I must protect my people, even if it costs me my life.
I am astounded that you came to this world, and very glad about it too. You are most welcome here.
Yes.
You're sure?
Onward!
